code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./Product.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Product(props){const[cart,setCart]=useState(props.product.cart);function addToCart(){setCart(prev=>!prev);props.addToCart(props.product);}function removeFromCart(){setCart(prev=>!prev);props.removeFromCart(props.product);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"title",children:props.product.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("small",{children:"$"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"prc",children:props.product.price})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rating"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:props.product.img,alt:"",className:"product-img"})}),cart===false?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"addtocart",onClick:addToCart,children:"Add to Cart"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"removefromcart",onClick:removeFromCart,children:"Remove from Cart"})]});}export default Product;
